greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular "Fibonacci array".
comment: Sum of n-th row = 2*A001629(n+1). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 07 2012
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 0..120 of triangle, flattened
L. Carlitz, A Fibonacci array, Fib. Quart. 1(#2) (1963), 217-28.
program: f us@(u:us') vs@(v:vs') = ws : f vs ws where
ws = [u + v, u + v + v] ++ zipWith (+) us vs'
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
ext: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Sep 28 2000
